articles.description: Everton's 10-point deduction for breaching Premier League financial rules is reduced on appeal.
articles.title: Everton punishment reduced to six points

articles.description: England should not be too disappointed despite defeat by India in Ranchi condemning Ben Stokes to his first series loss as captain, writes Jonathan Agnew.
articles.title: 'All not lost for England - Bashir looks the real deal'

articles.description: Great Britain's Andy Murray suggests he may only have a "few months" left of his tennis career after earning his second win of 2024 in Dubai.
articles.title: Andy Murray: Briton suggests he may only have few months left of career

articles.description: BBC Sport's chief F1 writer Andrew Benson answers your questions before the 2024 season opener in Bahrain this weekend.
articles.title: F1 Q&A: Andrew Benson answers your questions before the start of the 2024 season

articles.description: As non-league Maidstone United's FA Cup heroes prepare to face Coventry City, midfielder Sam Bone opens up on being diagnosed with testicular cancer at the age of 18.
articles.title: 'To be told at 18 you've got cancer was very scary'

articles.description: Chloe Kelly is set to return for England's friendly against Italy on Tuesday following an assessment on a minor injury.
articles.title: Kelly set to return for England against Italy

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at what happens next after Everton's appeal and if there will still be a chaotic ending to the Premier League season.
articles.title: Will there still be 'chaos' at end of Premier League season?

articles.description: The England jersey appears to be "weighing heavy" for Steve Borthwick's players after defeat by Scotland in the Six Nations, says Ugo Monye.
articles.title: England jersey 'weighing heavy' - Monye

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on Kaiser Chiefs bassist & Leeds fan Simon Rix to make predictions for this week's FA Cup fifth-round ties.
articles.title: Sutton's FA Cup predictions v Kaiser Chiefs bassist Simon Rix

articles.description: The UCI hands out suspensions to members of Cynisca Cycling after the team disguised a mechanic as a rider to ensure they could take part in the Argenta Classic.
articles.title: UCI hands out suspensions after Cynisca Cycling found guilty of participating 'in a fraud'
